hero.title: Master Agentic Development
hero.subtitle: Reduce software development complexity by delegating to AI agents.
hero.summary: Complete method to transform your teams

challenges.title: Change is fast & brutal
items: Large companies show us that code is becoming majority AI and agent generated
Available tools often lead to irrelevant results
No one shows how to use them professionally
Controlling these agents and aligning them with our needs is key

promises.title: What we enable you to do
items: Understand the new paradigm and leverage it
Do the work of 5 people with one
Move from *vibe coding* to adopt structured, reliable and reproducible programming
Scale your projects without increasing your workforce
Delegate to specialized agents, and put their power at your service
Cover the entire software development cycle with agents

training.title: Training Content
training.subtitle: 8 structured modules to master agentic programming from A to Z.

modules.title: Understanding current software development challenges
modules.description: Identify real bottlenecks and understand how AI agents can alleviate the workload.

modules.title: Fundamentals of agentic programming
modules.description: Difference between vibe coding and agentic programming. Principles for structuring workflow with agents.

modules.title: Overview of tools and practices
modules.description: State of the art latest code editors and AI tools. Technology watch of development environments.

modules.title: Hands-on practice with Claude Code and essential tools
modules.description: Setting up a work environment. Concrete examples of use for generation and automation.

modules.title: Specialized agents and MCP
modules.description: Understanding the role of dedicated agents. How to keep agents aligned and manage complexity.

modules.title: Practical demonstrations
modules.description: Create a website from a description. Build a dashboard in a few steps.

modules.title: Productivity and efficiency
modules.description: Tips, shortcuts and best practices to code faster and cleaner.

modules.title: From code to deployment
modules.description: Deployment basics to put projects into production quickly and efficiently.

solution.title: Our transformation method
solution.subtitle: Practical training, complete guide and support towards autonomy.
solution.subtitle_highlight: Master the tools, implement the methods, transform your processes.

steps.title: Intensive training
steps.description: Master Claude Code, MCP servers and the art of working with specialized agents. Training adapted to technical and non-technical profiles.

steps.title: Complete development cycle
steps.description: Learn how agents cover the entire cycle: from design to testing, from deployment to maintenance. Accessible even to non-technical users.

steps.title: Guide and autonomy
steps.description: Complete manual, prompt templates, ready configurations and Circle community. Your teams work efficiently with agents in complete autonomy.
